column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: Two Chinese men were seriously injured after a Prius they were in crashed into a lake at 9:30 pm on  January 7
column4: 2020 in  Choeung Ek district.------According to sources from the scene
column5: they first saw a silver Prius driving at speed in north-south direction. The car then collided with a streetside pole
column6: left the road and overturned into the water. ------RASMEI
